mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (EMAIL, PASSWORD, USER_NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE_NUMBER, ROLE) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{role});
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId, EMAIL, PASSWORD, USER_NAME as userName, ADDRESS, PHONE_NUMBER as phoneNumber, ROLE FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT USER_ID as userId, EMAIL, PASSWORD, USER_NAME as userName, ADDRESS, PHONE_NUMBER as phoneNumber, ROLE FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
